item.title: Para nutricionista, mudanças no cardápio do McDonald´s não é eficaz « Aqui se paga
item.description: McDonald´s saudável? http://t.co/bg9Ln8H
item.content:encoded: McDonald´s saudável? http://t.co/bg9Ln8H Menos sódio, mais frutas. Menos fritura, mais salada. No dia 1º de outubro, entra em vigor o novo cardápio do McDonald´s no Brasil. A pedido do Planeta, as mudanças –que incluem novos produtos e a redução de açúcar, sódio e calorias das opções atuais — foram avaliadas pelo especialista Daniel Bandoni, professor adjunto do curso de Nutrição da Universidade Federal de São Paulo (Unifesp). Link - Trackbacks

item.title: How to Liberate Your Data from Google (And Why It Matters That You Can)
item.description: How to Liberate Your Data from Google (And Why It Matters That You Can) http://rww.to/p47Ao1
item.content:encoded: How to Liberate Your Data from Google (And Why It Matters That You Can) http://rww.to/p47Ao1 Anytime you sign up for a new product or service online, you need to ask yourself these three questions, says Google's Brian Fitzpatrick: 1. Can I get my data out in an open, interchangeable format? 2. How much will it cost me to do so? 3. How much of my time is it going to take to get my data out? Of course, most of us neglect to ask these questions, and as such, we frequently find our data "stuck." We're then locked in to using certain products because of the time or money involved in moving elsewhere - that... Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: readwriteweb.com

item.title: Important: Topify will be *shut down* on August 5th, 2011 - Topify Blog
item.description: Important update: Topify will be shut down on August 5th, 2011. Full details on our blog: http://t.co/TaMjdtZ :-(
item.content:encoded: Important update: Topify will be shut down on August 5th, 2011. Full details on our blog: http://t.co/TaMjdtZ :-( A week ago, without any prior notice, Twitter changed their backend resulting in removing headers from their emails which we used to provide you the Topify service. Once I discovered about this change, I asked on their official developers support forum about it and twice sent a mention to @TwitterAPI account. All of these were unanswered until today. Today they finally posted a clarification: Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: topify.com

item.title: Cleaning Wounds with Peroxide May Cause More Harm than Good
item.description: Cleaning Wounds with Peroxide May Cause More Harm than Good [Health] http://bit.ly/nE3CPH
item.content:encoded: Cleaning Wounds with Peroxide May Cause More Harm than Good [Health] http://bit.ly/nE3CPH Most people aren't afraid to use rubbing alcohol or hydrogen peroxide to disinfect a wound when they get a cut. According to WebMD however, using peroxide on a wound can actually harm the tissue around it and delay the healing process. This is just one first aid fallacy they're out to debunk. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: lifehacker.com

item.content:encoded: It's time to end the madness. Tell Congress to pass a clean debt ceiling increase. Now! http://t.co/GUwXiQz via @MoveOn Time is running out in Washington and no compromise bill is coming. The best way to avoid default is for reasonable members of both parties to pass a "clean" bill that simply assures the rest of the world that America pays its debts. Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: iAmerica? Apple has more money than the United States federal government http://t.co/PeGvStn Read 'Apple has more cash than the federal government' from our blog The Ticket on Yahoo! News. Who's ready for iAmerica? As the BBC has reported, the software company Apple has more cash on hand than the United States federal government, according to the company's financial records. Apple's quarterly financial report shows that the company responsible for the iPad, iPod and the iPhone now has $76.4 billion in reserve cash, while the [...] Link - Trackbacks
